author: apayne@businessinsider.com (Adam Payne), Adam Payne
title: A leading South Korean doctor warns that Trump's 'pride' and 'ego' is putting the world's health at risk
description: Getty Donald Trump's pride and ego will have "global repercussions" for tackling the coronavirus pandemic, according to a South Korean doctor, whose aggressive approach to tackling the virus was a model for the country's success. Doctor Min Pok-Kee told Wired…
content: Trump's refusal to implement mass-testing for the coronavirus in the United States will have "global repercussions" for suppressing the virus, according to a South Korean doctor whose aggressive approach to tackling the virus has been a model for limiting its… [+3650 chars]
